import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik' import './CompanyProfile.css' import companyImage from './Generic Company.jpeg' import history from '../../../../history' import { useState } from 'react' export default function CompanyProfile() { //TODO if password is empty, keep the password from props const initialPassword = '' const handleSubmit = (values, { setFieldValue }) => { //TODO finish this if (initialValues.email === values.email) { //Don't send email } if (initialValues.name === values.name) { //Don't send name } alert(JSON.stringify(values)) setFieldValue('password', '') } return (
handleSubmit(values, { setFieldValue })} > {({ values, dirty }) => (<>
Name
Email
Password
)}
) }
